definition: orchid (蘭花|兰花 Cymbidium goeringii)/fragrant thoroughwort (蘭草|兰草 Eupatorium fortunei)/lily magnolia (木蘭|木兰)
surname Lan/abbr. for Lanzhou 蘭州|兰州[Lan2 zhou1], Gansu

sentences.english: Well, what the high gas prices have to do with a bottle of tequila?
sentences.chinese: 高漲的油價和一瓶龍舌蘭酒究竟有什麼關係呢？

sentences.english: You will take all of your tequilas along with you, but discard me, will you?
sentences.chinese: 你會把你所有的龍舌蘭帶走，但是丟下我，是嗎？

sentences.english: After the agaves are crushed at the distillery, why are they loaded into a hornos?
sentences.chinese: 當龍舌蘭在酒廠被壓榨後，爲什麼要被放進烤爐中呢？

sentences.english: His early life path became as twisted as the notorious mescal worm.
sentences.chinese: 他的早年生活變得跟惡名昭彰的龍舌蘭蟲一樣瘋狂？

sentences.english: Agave nectar is one alternative that is used by health conscious consumers.
sentences.chinese: 龍舌蘭花蜜是具有保健意識的消費者的選擇之一。

sentences.english: We also enjoyed the famous Mexican tequila to celebrate in the pavilion restaurant.
sentences.chinese: 該館餐廳也如約向所有球迷贈送了一杯龍舌蘭酒。

sentences.english: Why are the agaves not harvested until the plants reach their optimum maturity?
sentences.chinese: 爲什麼龍舌蘭只有到達成熟期時才收割？

sentences.english: But then I took a shot of tequila and came to my senses.
sentences.chinese: 但後來我幹了一杯龍舌蘭酒，就恢復了理性。

sentences.english: The century plant blooms only once in its lifetime.
sentences.chinese: 龍舌蘭在其一生中只開一次花。

sentences.english: Mescal San Cosme is the link between past and present.
sentences.chinese: 龍舌蘭新科姆是過去和現在之間的聯繫。

sentences.english: The wife and that Beijing girls jumped enlighten, was called a bottle of American agave liquor.
sentences.chinese: 老婆和那個北京女孩蹦迪去了，就叫上一瓶龍舌蘭酒。

sentences.english: Spread a scoop of canned pumpkin on toasted whole wheat bread and then drizzle agave or maple syrup on top.
sentences.chinese: 在全麥烤麪包上塗上罐頭南瓜，龍舌蘭小雨或楓糖漿。

sentences.english: On Sept 26th, 2005, Spring was invited to attend the mescal party held by Mexico Consulate Shanghai.
sentences.chinese: 劉春泉律師出席墨西哥龍舌蘭酒品酒及推廣會。

sentences.english: So it's like a mase , it has passage ways all round.
sentences.chinese: 在龍舌蘭的地下就有很多這樣的很寬的通道。

sentences.english: The blue maguey is used to make both tequila and mescal.
sentences.chinese: 藍色的龍舌蘭通常會製造成蒸餾酒和麥斯卡爾酒。

sentences.english: I downed my shot of mescal. I could feel it burn in my throat.
sentences.chinese: 我把手裏的龍舌蘭一口吞了，喉嚨裏火辣辣的。

definition: name of a famous Tang dynasty wine/same as 白酒[bai2 jiu3]
